content.rendered:
Medical Assistant | Stillwater, Oklahoma
  • Full-Time, Monday-Friday 8:00am-5:00pm
  • Prefer current CPR license
  • 1+ year experience in a medical clinic a MUST
  • EMR experience preferred
  • RMA/CMA preferred, but stable work history more important
  • Will give shots, take blood, take and chart vitals, document growth charts, call in prescriptions, make appointments, and other duties as needed
  • $11-$13/hour
